AI软件改善了产前超声中先天性心脏缺陷的检测先天性心脏缺陷（出生时出现的心脏异常）是最常见的先天缺陷类型，根据疾病控制和预防中心，大约有四分之一的患有心脏缺陷的婴儿中有1个患有严重的诊断足以在生命的第一年内需要手术或其他医疗干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/ai-software-improves-detection-finceent-congenital-hernital-defects-inpernatal-ultrasounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/ai-software-improves-detection-ef-congenital-declect-congenital-defects-inpenatal-ultrasounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A2B5C5F8-19C1-4035-9C5D-624AAB3836B8 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 02:18:05 -0500 AI software improves detection of congenital heart defects in prenatal ultrasounds

研究发现没有证据将镰状细胞性状与猝死联系起来一项系统的文献综述没有发现证据表明没有横纹肌溶解（肌肉崩溃）或热损伤会导致镰状细胞性状（SCT）的猝死，也没有任何高级证据表明SCT会导致急性疼痛危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/study-finds-no-vidence-no-vidence-linking-sickle-cell-cell-cell-trait-trait-to-sudden-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/study-finds-no-vidence-no-vidence-linking-sickle-cell-cell-cell-trait-trait-to-sudden-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76f1a6b2-236d-4c4d-805a-f9a13a13dcfb07b Fri, 31 Jan 2025 01:52:40 -0500 Study finds no evidence linking sickle cell trait to sudden death
突破模型模拟实验室中的人骨髓功能骨髓隐藏在我们的骨骼中，每天都会产生数十亿个血细胞，从携带氧气的红细胞到促进免疫的白细胞来维持生命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/breakthrough-model-simulates-human-bone-marrow-marrow-function-in-the-lab.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/breakthrough-model-simulate-human-bone-marrow-marrow-function-in-the-lab.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=976b11f8-be5a-47bc-47BC-AF88-48D6109402D3 Fri, 31 Jan 2025 01:26:47 -0500 Breakthrough model simulates human bone marrow function in the lab
3D打印的类脑样模型有助于解锁神经元的生长秘密大脑中的关键细胞通过交换信号，使大脑能够以惊人的速度学习和适应网络。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/3D-printed-brain-like-model-model-helps-unlock-neyron-neuron-growth-secrets.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250131/3d-printed-brain-like-model-model-helps-unlock-nocl-neuron-growth-secrets.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d285da6-f3f5-4fe6-9bd4-a80621E37A3E Fri, 31 Jan 2025 01:08:42 -0500 3D-printed brain-like model helps unlock neuron growth secrets
Integra Biosciences的试剂分配器现在支持Sila-2集成Integra Biosciences的WellJet试剂分配器现在支持基于实验室自动化的Sila-2标准通信协议的API命令。这种新的功能将使将井泽特集成到自动化实验室工作流程中变得更加容易，从而帮助实验室提高其生产力和可重复性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/integra-biosciences-reagent-dispenser-now-now-supports-now-supports-sila-2-integration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/integra-biosciences-reagent-dispenser-now-now-supports-sila-2-inclegration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0132B585-1A4C-41F0-9086-ECB47991D65A Thu, 30 Jan 2025 22:52:00 -0500 INTEGRA Biosciences' reagent dispenser now supports SiLA-2 integration

新的研究旨在提高人们对上神经切开力学的理解每年分娩期间数以百万计的妇女在分娩期间经历了伴奏，但是这些手术切割背后的机制在很大程度上仍未被研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/new-research-aims-to-improve-undrove-underding-of-episiotomy-mechanics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250130/new-research-aims-to-improve-underve---episiotomy-mechanics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb75cf6e-8c57-4671-8BE4-938E2C121E05 Thu, 30 Jan 2025 22:05:16 -0500 New research aims to improve understanding of episiotomy mechanics
